tooltip.thefrozenmod.frozen_grass.toolti: Freeze me again and i'll turn into ice!
tooltip.thefrozenmod.frozenite_chisel.sh: When shifting, blocks instantly turn to ice!
tooltip.thefrozenmod.frozenite_chisel: Blocks freeze before turning to ice! (Shift for more info)
tooltip.thefrozenmod.ice_cubes.tooltip: These freezing chunks of ice wake you up and make you much faster!
